article_title: Rocky road to electronic medical records
article_text:
About this blog

By Marjorie Arons-Barron

For nearly three decades, in both print and electronic journalism, Marjorie Arons-Barron wrote about politics, social issues and more. Now she adds occasional thoughts on music, books and theater to her portfolio and hopes you’ll join in.

Recent Posts

article_metadata.description: Have you ever wondered if the doctor who saw you in his office would recognize you if you met at the grocery?   He or she  might not, and it's not just because you're in street  clothes. It might be that, with new … Continue reading →
